comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool. The Consultant shall conduct Product Transfer Area Assessments (PTAs) for each of the following three (3) storage tank systems: the diesel tank associated with the back-up generator and the methanol tank associated with the clarifier at the Port Granby Water Treatment Plant (WTP) in Clarington, ON; and the diesel tank associated with the back-up generator at the Port Hope WTP in Port Hope, ON, and provide recommendations to bring the product transfer areas into compliance with Environment Canada's Storage Tank Systems for Petroleum Products and Allied Petroleum Products Regulations.
